            id: 'immediate-vesting',
            trigger: { type: 'VESTING_START_DATE' },
            quantity: '800000',
            description: '10% of the shares (800,000 shares) vest immediately upon execution of the agreement.',
            next_condition_ids: [ 'cliff-vesting' ]
          },
          {
            id: 'cliff-vesting',
            trigger: {
              type: 'VESTING_SCHEDULE_RELATIVE',
              period: {
                type: 'MONTHS',
                length: 12,
                occurrences: 1,
                day_of_month: 'VESTING_START_DAY_OR_LAST_DAY_OF_MONTH'
              },
              relative_to_condition_id: 'immediate-vesting'
            },
            quantity: '1200000',
            description: '15% of the shares (1,200,000 shares) vest on the first anniversary of the agreement.',
            next_condition_ids: [ 'monthly-vesting' ]
          },
          {
            id: 'monthly-vesting',
            portion: { numerator: '1', remainder: false, denominator: '36' },
            trigger: {
              type: 'VESTING_SCHEDULE_RELATIVE',
              period: {
                type: 'MONTHS',
                length: 1,
                occurrences: 36,
                day_of_month: 'VESTING_START_DAY_OR_LAST_DAY_OF_MONTH'
              },
              relative_to_condition_id: 'cliff-vesting'
            },
            description: 'The remaining 75% of the shares (6,000,000 shares) vest in equal monthly installments over 36 months.',
            next_condition_ids: []
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}
